title: Puyo Puyo~n
caption:
Credits: Video Editor, Graphic Editor, Proofreader, Playtester
With the Precise Museum, we created a fan-made translation patch of the Dreamcast game Puyo Puyo~n. From the in-game menus, to VMU animations, and even to custom implemented dialogue boxes for the games' story mode; we've made the game completely playable for English-speaking audiences!

title: Puyo Puyo Chronicle
caption: Credits: Video Editor, Graphic Editor, Proofreader, Playtester

title: Let's Head Out, On We Go! Puyo Puyo!!!
caption:
Credits: Subtitler, Video Editor
A fan-made video translation of a song released for Super Puyo Puyo Quest.

title: No Embed example

title: No Button Example

title: Oops, don't have an image or video!
caption: Probably not the best, but can be used for other things, like go back. Define target "_self" if you want to prevent a new window.
